channel.title: Posts on Andy T. Beck
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Andy T. Beck

item.title: Getting this site up
item.description: In this post, I will document the steps I took to get this site live. Hopefully it will serve as a helpful resource for anyone who might be looking to do something similar (i.e., build a blog using blogdown, host it using github pages, use a custom domain name, etc).

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.
